name: Universal Dashboard
short_description:
Whatever our job, we all have small projects with tasks to do, when we are alone to work, it's easy but when a team work, not localized in the same town or country, it's a little bit more difficult.
The online dashboard is a "kanban style" solution. I found lots of similar software, all are too difficult to use.
This one is the easier to use to my point of view, it concentrate on essentials, Project tasks and profile (each profile can contain one or more user).
This is the first version of the software, please leave me some reviews to help me improve it.
I however admit that it's not the most beautifull, but it's clear and simple. Maybe, if this dashboard is enough downloaded, i will improve it...
Just ask me, LDAP support for example, or AJAX work...
